name: Theseus' Adventure
description:
Embody a Greek hero and defeat the monsters of the Maze!

In an era with gods and mythical beasts, there was a myth about a Minotaur that laid inside of a labyrinth, under the castle of Crete, that eats Athens children. Theseus, always in search of glory, volunteered himself to go to the Labyrinth to defeat the Minotaur and end the sacrifices of the children.

Features:

. Own interpretation of greek mythology

. Cartoony art style

. Good soundtrack that accentuates the action of the game 

. Endless survival

Controls:

Move: WASD

Dash: Shift

Attack: Left Mouse Click
